fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives: Economic governance, constitutional developments, enlargement, future of the EU, Brexit negotiations
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The IPA is Ireland's premier public sector management development agency. Founded in 1957 it seeks to promote the study and improvement of standards of public administration and management. In addition to research and publications, the Institute offers primary degree, diploma and certificate programmes as well as postgraduate programmes.
